descriptionHtml:
Contractor Armor Retexture By DragonGurl

This is a Retex of ZeroFrost\\\'s Contractor Armor to fit in more with the Dark Brotherhood and the Assassin in all of us...

INSTALLATION::::
1. First install the main armor mod, if you haven\\\'t already : [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38386\"]CONTRACTOR ARMOR BY ZEROFROST[/url]
2. Install the retexture with NMM or manually.
a) with NMM ... easy as it is! Click yes to all overwriting questions.
b) manually: copy the files from the Contractor folder and paste them into your own -> Data -> textures -> armor -> Contractor,
say yes to overwriting.
3. Enjoy :)

Deinstallation or changing back to the old: easy way with NMM.
Manually you first have to get the files from Zerofrosts original and let them overwrite the retexture again.

If you have any issues, please let me now as this is my first mod published ever. 

CREDIT:::::

All credits goes to Zerofrost, for making this beautiful piece of art.
Thank you very much for letting me publish this!

And of course credit goes to Forzane for help using photoshop and figuring out Nexus
author: Dragongurl and Forzane
